data.description:
Now with Quest 2 enhancements! 

Jump into a nitro fuelled world where little cars mean BIG fun! Spanning across reclaimed ruins and scorched outbacks through to rain soaked docks and sun-kissed tropical islands - Mini Motor Racing X will take you on a micro driving journey across the globe like no other.

FEATURES:

QUEST 2 ENHANCEMENTS: Stunning new water & reflections with higher render resolutions than ever before

HUGE CAREERS: Collect dozens of cars and race on over 50 tracks in hundreds of races with vibrant, rich visuals, day and night and in varying weather conditions. 

PARTY MODES: Play with your friends in a selection of wild party games including Bumper Ball, Drop Zone, Battle Area and more!

UPGRADE YOUR RIDES: Pump your hard earned winnings into upgrades to help give you the edge.

MULTIPLAYER: Full online multiplayer with up to 4 friends and campaign co-op.

MULTIPLE WAYS TO PLAY: Play from in-car, top-down, track-side or anywhere else that takes your fancy!

changelog.change_log:
MMRX v1.3.6

* Added support for the new Oculus Cloud Backup system

MMRX v1.3.5

* Fixed night versions of tracks missing their unique music (Not all night tracks have unique music).

* Fixed an issue that could cause a lap to not count on the Suburbia track.

MMRX v1.3.4

* Added an in car view option to the introduction tutorial.

MMRX v1.3.3

* Fixed several potential desyncs in multiplayer
* Fixed some unintentionally loud ambience on several tracks

MMRX v1.3.2

* Fixed an issue that could cause players in 2D mode to become immovable objects in multiplayer.

MMRX v1.3.1

* Added room codes to allow direct multiplayer joining with friends, across platforms.

MMRX v1.3.0

* New Party Modes: Play with your friends online in a selection of wild party games -- each with their own unique tracks -- including Bumper Ball, Drop Zone, Battle Area, King of the Road and, Bomb's Away! 

* Improved new player experience.

* Combined Type X & Classic multiplayer pools for easier online matchmaking.

* Improved online UI experience, more game modes, more options!

* Performance and stability improvements.

* Various minor bug fixes.

MMRX v1.2.4

* Added French, German, Japanese, Korean & Spanish localization

MMRX v1.2.0

Quest 2 Enhancements:
    * Improved water with reflections.
    * Higher render resolution.

Fixes:
    * Removed permission requirement in order to use Oculus Cloud Storage.

* The MMRX Gon' Give It To Ya achievement will now unlock correctly!
* Added a toggle to invert reverse direction in the options.
* Fixed the lobby intro sequence audio not being tied with the audio sliders in the options.
* Fixed an issue that would cause the nitro sound to loop for the remainder of a race.
* Fixed an issue that was causing the lobby ambience effects to loop consistently.
* Various audio cues have been fixed and will now play the correct sound.
* Fixed an issue that could cause multiplayer crossplay to sometimes fail.

v1.1.0 Update

* Added an effect to display what upgrade you receive when completing a lap in Type X
* Your preferred camera selection is now saved between sessions
* Enabled VOIP for Rift & Quest crossplay
* Added a button to enter Party Mode in the Arcade tab when playing online
* You can now cycle through camera perspectives in the opposite direction by clicking the off hand analog stick
* Audio options can now be tweaked mid race!
* Fixed an issue preventing users from selecting UI when the hand controls UI is active
* Fixed an issue that could cause the car selection remote to not always descend in the lobby
* Other bug fixes and improvements under the hood

v1.0.1 Hotfix

* Fixed an issue that prevented users progressing after denying permissions for Cloud Storage
* Fixed an issue where sometimes users would have performance drops when playing on a Quest after loading cloud save data from a Rift
